identity.mission: Create a top 1% dashboard design that blends 'Control Room' density with 'Electric & Neon' vibrancy.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix professional data density with gaming-tier aesthetics.
Emotion First: Data should feel alive, not static.
Content is King: Every pixel must serve the data.
Zoom In: Use bold focus on essential metrics.
Negative Space: Use it to group data logically, not just for decoration.
Contrast: High contrast for readability in dark mode.

headings.usage: All headers (h1-h6), big metrics, and modal titles.

body.usage: General text, table data, form labels.

mono.usage: Code snippets, API keys, specific data values.

rules: Overlines/Labels must be Uppercase + tracking-widest + text-xs.
Line height: leading-none for headers, leading-relaxed for body.
Span Logic: Summary (col-span-1), Primary Data (col-span-2 row-span-2), Feed (col-span-1 row-span-2)
Every pixel utilized. Use h-full on children.

spacing.philosophy: Generous internal padding (p-6) for containers to prevent text collision.

cards.implementation: bg-card border border-border/40 shadow-none hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300

inputs.style: bg-background border-input focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/50 focus:border-primary transition-all

tables.style: Compact, dense. Header: text-xs uppercase tracking-wider text-muted-foreground. Rows: hover:bg-muted/50 transition-colors.

textures.usage: Subtle noise overlay on the main background to kill digital flatness.
textures.css: background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E");

products.description: Apple Watch and iPhone flat lay

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px or 2px. Consistent sizing (w-4 h-4 for small, w-5 h-5 for medium).

universal_guidelines: Do not use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Manrope'.
Do not use pure black (#000000). Use tinted darks (#0B0C15).
All interactive elements must have data-testid.
Do not use generic centered layouts. Use the 'Control Room' grid.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install necessary fonts (Manrope, IBM Plex Sans). 2. Update tailwind.config.js with the new color palette. 3. Create a global layout wrapper that applies the background and font settings. 4. Build the dashboard using the 'Control Room' grid strategy. 5. Use the provided image URLs for mock data.
